title: Fintech Seed fundraising metrics benchmarks
summary: Fintech seed metrics focus on customer quality, unit economics, and risk management. Growth matters less than sustainable economics and demonstrated ability to manage financial services complexity. Investors benchmark against typical fintech development patterns and unit economics targets. Pitchchat keeps fundraising metrics investor-ready in one room.

metrics.label: Monthly Active Users
metrics.note: Users engaging meaningfully with core features. Quality and engagement matter more than raw numbers.

metrics.label: Monthly Revenue
metrics.note: Recurring revenue from interchange, subscriptions, or transaction fees. Path to $100K+ MRR for Series A.

metrics.label: Revenue Per User
metrics.note: Monthly revenue per active user. Varies by product type—lending higher, payments lower.

metrics.label: Customer Acquisition Cost
metrics.note: Blended CAC. Consumer typically $30-80, SMB can be higher. Channel mix significantly impacts.

metrics.label: LTV:CAC Ratio
metrics.note: Early-stage ratio with clear path to 4:1+. Use actual customer data, not projections.

metrics.label: 30-Day Retention
metrics.note: Percentage of users active 30 days after signup. Engagement quality matters.

metrics.label: Fraud Rate
metrics.note: Fraud losses as percentage of volume. Below 0.5% is excellent, above 2% is concerning.

metrics.label: Dispute Rate
metrics.note: Customer disputes and chargebacks. High rates indicate product or customer quality issues.

metrics.label: Net Promoter Score
metrics.note: Customer satisfaction indicator. Fintech NPS varies widely—trust and reliability drive scores.

metrics.label: Regulatory Status
metrics.note: Licensed directly or operating compliantly through partner. Clear regulatory path defined.
